plot: David Lynch and Crispin Glover team up to make a mainstream Hollywood movie. Now they just have to figure out what it means to be "mainstream."
title: David Lynch and Crispin Glover's Big Box Office Blockbuster
plot_es: David Lynch and Crispin Glover team up to make a mainstream Hollywood movie. Now they just have to figure out what it means to be "mainstream."
original_name: David Lynch and Crispin Glover's Big Box Office Blockbuster
plot_en: David Lynch and Crispin Glover team up to make a mainstream Hollywood movie. Now they just have to figure out what it means to be "mainstream."
